title: Borderlands.The.Pre.Sequel.Update.v1.0.5.Incl.DLC-ALI213
description:
Instructions for use:
1. Unzip 
2. Copy all files to the game directory covering 
3. Start game

[color=red]Already contains all previous archive retrieval + DLC[/color]
How to get your saves back:
1. Copy the entire contents of the old archive folder (17 digit code archive folder) of (old and new can be judged according to the modification date) 
2. pasted into a new archive folder 
3. Open the game to continue the game

Archive location: My Documents  My Games  Borderlands The Pre-Sequel  WillowGame  SaveData  XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

[color=blue]Changelog[/color]:
[code]Coming March 24, 2015

Version 1.0.5 Patch Notes 

The following bosses will now respawn when a player exits and re-enters a map: 

Tiny Destroyer 
Boomer 
Rabid Adams 
Giant Shuggarath 
Bruce 
Rooster Booster 
Even-More-Disgusting Tork 
Drongo Bones 
Meg 
CLAP-L3K 
Lost Legion Powersuit Noob 
Meat Head 

(Note: Col. Zarpedon's loot pool has been added to the Sentinel since Zarpedon cannot respawn.) 
[/code]
Full changelog on steam: http://store.steampowered.com/news/?appids=261640
